ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards ROle (was CHains)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... THe bard is in charge of chasing runners if its safe.  If running is not option, the wizard will usually nuke them late, or one of us will root (thus
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Oh man, that was exactly my posse before I left, they were all very serious
> about their roles and we became a well oiled killing machine in Solusek's
> Eye. There was the issue of runners (the warrior would chase, leaving no one
> to taunt the mobs off me) but when we added a Rogue and he took that on it
> was nearly perfect.

THe bard is in charge of chasing runners if its safe. If running is not
option, the wizard will usually nuke them late, or one of us will root
(thus wasting mana, gads I wish our druid would come back)

Somitimes some mobs stick to her when she runs, if that happens I will
help her out...

--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
